description: This file defines and configures multiple AI agents (Web, Finance, YouTube) using the 'agno' framework, including their models, tools, storage, and a playground setup for testing and serving these agents.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an AI agent with specific roles, models, tools, and configurations.

classes.name: Ollama
classes.description: Model class representing an Ollama language model with specific ID.

classes.name: Playground
classes.description: A class to set up a testing environment for multiple agents, providing a web app interface.

classes.name: SqliteStorage
classes.description: Handles storage of agent data in a SQLite database.

classes.name: DuckDuckGoTools
classes.description: Tools for web search via DuckDuckGo.

classes.name: YFinanceTools
classes.description: Tools for financial data retrieval and analysis.

classes.name: YouTubeTools
classes.description: Tools for processing YouTube videos and captions.

methods.name: get_app
methods.description: Returns the web application instance for the playground.

methods.name: serve
methods.description: Starts the web server to serve the application.
